[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "



BIRTHS AND DEATHS REGISTRATION ACT, 1968


CERTIFICATE OF DEATH


(Regulation 9)



"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

1. Certficate Number                  {{ doc.name }}



2. Identity Number                    {{ doc.deceased_identity }}



3. Full Name                        {{ doc.names_given }} {{ doc.surname }}



4. Date of Birth                        {{ doc.date_of_birth }}



5. Gender                           {{ doc.gender }}



6. Nationality                        {{ doc.deceased_nationality }}



7. Date of Death                     {{ doc.date_of_death }}



8. Cause of Death                      {{ doc.disease_condition }}



9. Date of Registration                   {{ doc.posting_date }}



"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

I hereby certify the above to be a true and correct extract from the Deaths Register kept at Gaborone in the Republic of Botswana.


Dated {{ doc.posting_date }}

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

{% if doc.workflow_state == 'Approved' %} {% endif %}

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Registrar of Births and Deaths

"}]
name: Death Certificate
